primaryIttf.content:
h/root/empty_layout()

	$append head-styles
		$if mpage.body.fontFamily === 'roboto'
			css https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto
		css ./styles.css.ittf?_context=mpage&_mpage=json

	$include h/navTop
	
	ul
		class nav-sub-top
		$foreach item in mpage.navSubTop.items
			li
				class nav-sub-top-text-1
				a ${item.label}
					href ${item.href}

	. nav-left
		ul
			$foreach item in mpage.navLeft.items
				li
					a
						href 
						i
							class nav-left-fa fa-${item.icon} fa-2x
						span ${item.label}
							class nav-left-text-1

	. wrap-main
		. cont-main
			$if mpage.debug.showPalette
				div
					style display:flex; flex-wrap: wrap;
					$foreach c in mpage.theme.colors
						div ${c}
							style margin: 10px; font-weight: 900;
							div
								style height: 50px; width: 50px; background: ${c};

			$if mpage.contMain.panels.length > 0
				
				$foreach panel in mpage.contMain.panels
					
					$if panel.kind === 'cards'
						
						. card-1-grid
							$foreach card in panel.cards
								. card-1 card-1-${card.key}
									a
										href ${card.href}
										. card-1-teaser 
											+ ${card.teaser}
										. card-1-title
											+ ${card.title}
										. card-1-sub-title
											+ ${card.subtitle}
			
			$else
				
				$ var i = 0
				$while i < 10
					p
						lorem 150
					$ i++
primaryIttf.pretty:
1 h/root/empty_layout()
2 $append head-styles
3 $if mpage.body.fontFamily === 'roboto'
4 css https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto
5 css ./styles.css.ittf?_context=mpage&_mpage=json
6 $include h/navTop
7 ul
8 class nav-sub-top
9 $foreach item in mpage.navSubTop.items
10 li
11 class nav-sub-top-text-1
12 a ${item.label}
13 href ${item.href}
14 . nav-left
15 ul
16 $foreach item in mpage.navLeft.items
17 li
18 a
19 href
20 i
21 class nav-left-fa fa-${item.icon} fa-2x
22 span ${item.label}
23 class nav-left-text-1
24 . wrap-main
25 . cont-main
26 $if mpage.debug.showPalette
27 div
28 style display:flex; flex-wrap: wrap;
29 $foreach c in mpage.theme.colors
30 div ${c}
31 style margin: 10px; font-weight: 900;
32 div
33 style height: 50px; width: 50px; background: ${c};
34 $if mpage.contMain.panels.length > 0
35 $foreach panel in mpage.contMain.panels
36 $if panel.kind === 'cards'
37 . card-1-grid
38 $foreach card in panel.cards
39 . card-1 card-1-${card.key}
40 a
41 href ${card.href}
42 . card-1-teaser
43 + ${card.teaser}
44 . card-1-title
45 + ${card.title}
46 . card-1-sub-title
47 + ${card.subtitle}
48 $else
49 $ var i = 0
50 $while i < 10
51 p
52 lorem 150
53 $ i++

fragments.name: h/root/empty_layout
fragments.ittfContent:
html
	$params title|@@null

    head 
		$if title != null
			@title ${title}
        meta 
            charset utf-8
        meta 
            name viewport
			content width=device-width, initial-scale=1
		
		script
			module
				var WizziBrowser
					{ 
						@ log
							function 
								var line
									_ Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments).map
										function 
											param argument
											return 
												iif typeof argument === 'string'
													then argument
													else JSON.stringify(argument)
										._ join
											@ '\n '
								if arguments.length > 1 && arguments[arguments.length-1] === '-'
								    set line += new Array(50).join('-')
								set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent += line + '\n'
						@ clearLog
							function 
								set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent = ''
						@ setStatus
							function 
								param status
								set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-status').textContent = status
						@ setContent
							function 
								param newContent
								var content = document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-content')
								while content.hasChildNodes()
									_ content.removeChild(content.lastChild)
								_ content.appendChild(newContent)
			
				# Add a global error event listener early on in the page load, to help ensure that browsers
				# which don't support specific functionality still end up displaying a meaningful message.
				_ window.addEventListener
					@ 'error'
					function 
						param error
						log 'Global window error', error
						if WizziBrowser && WizziBrowser.setStatus
							_ WizziBrowser.setStatus(error.message + ' (Your browser may not support this feature.)')
							# _ error.preventDefault
		
		$hook head-styles-0
		@style
			css
				# wizzi-browser-status
					margin .5em 0
					font-style italic
				# wizzi-browser-log
					margin .5em 0
					white-space pre-wrap
				# wizzi-browser-content
					margin .5em 0
				# status:empty, #log:empty, #content:empty
					display none
		$hook head-styles
		$hook head-styles-2

    body 

		$hook

		$include h/script_meta

		$hook body-scripts-0
		div
			# wizzi-browser-status
			# wizzi-browser-log
			# wizzi-browser-content
		$hook body-scripts
		$hook body-scripts-2
fragments.ittfPretty:
1 html
2 $params title|@@null
3 head
4 $if title != null
5 @title ${title}
6 meta
7 charset utf-8
8 meta
9 name viewport
10 content width=device-width, initial-scale=1
11 script
12 module
13 var WizziBrowser
14 {
15 @ log
16 function
17 var line
18 _ Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments).map
19 function
20 param argument
21 return
22 iif typeof argument === 'string'
23 then argument
24 else JSON.stringify(argument)
25 ._ join
26 @ '\n '
27 if arguments.length > 1 && arguments[arguments.length-1] === '-'
28 set line += new Array(50).join('-')
29 set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent += line + '\n'
30 @ clearLog
31 function
32 set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent = ''
33 @ setStatus
34 function
35 param status
36 set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-status').textContent = status
37 @ setContent
38 function
39 param newContent
40 var content = document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-content')
41 while content.hasChildNodes()
42 _ content.removeChild(content.lastChild)
43 _ content.appendChild(newContent)
44 # Add a global error event listener early on in the page load, to help ensure that browsers
45 # which don't support specific functionality still end up displaying a meaningful message.
46 _ window.addEventListener
47 @ 'error'
48 function
49 param error
50 log 'Global window error', error
51 if WizziBrowser && WizziBrowser.setStatus
52 _ WizziBrowser.setStatus(error.message + ' (Your browser may not support this feature.)')
53 # _ error.preventDefault
54 $hook head-styles-0
55 @style
56 css
57 # wizzi-browser-status
58 margin .5em 0
59 font-style italic
60 # wizzi-browser-log
61 margin .5em 0
62 white-space pre-wrap
63 # wizzi-browser-content
64 margin .5em 0
65 # status:empty, #log:empty, #content:empty
66 display none
67 $hook head-styles
68 $hook head-styles-2
69 body
70 $hook
71 $include h/script_meta
72 $hook body-scripts-0
73 div
74 # wizzi-browser-status
75 # wizzi-browser-log
76 # wizzi-browser-content
77 $hook body-scripts
78 $hook body-scripts-2

fragments.name: h/navTop
fragments.ittfPretty:
1 $group
2 ul
3 class nav-top
4 $foreach panel in mpage.navTop.panels
5 $if panel.kind === 'img-logo'
6 . nav-top-log
7 a
8 href ${panel.href}
9 img
10 src ${panel.src}
11 height ${panel.height}
12 width ${panel.width}
13 $if panel.kind === 'flex'
14 . flex-row
15 $foreach item in panel.items
16 li
17 class nav-top-text-1
18 a ${item.label}
19 href ${item.href}

fragments.name: h/script_meta
fragments.ittfContent:
$group
		
	$if isWizziStudio
    	script
    		module
    			_ document.addEventListener
    				@ 'keydown'
    				=>
    					param event
    					var keyName = event.key
    					if keyName === 'Control'
    						# do not alert when only Control key is pressed.
    						return
    
    					if event.ctrlKey && keyName === 'j'
    						set location.href= location.pathname + '?meta=json'
    						_ event.preventDefault
    						_ event.stopPropagation
    
    					if event.ctrlKey && keyName === 'h'
    						set location.href= location.pathname + '?meta=html'
    						_ event.preventDefault
    						_ event.stopPropagation
    						
    					if event.ctrlKey && keyName === 'b'
    					    var i = location.pathname.lastIndexOf('/')
    						set location.href= location.pathname.substr(0, i) + '?meta=html'
    						_ event.preventDefault
    						_ event.stopPropagation
fragments.ittfPretty:
1 $group
2 $if isWizziStudio
3 script
4 module
5 _ document.addEventListener
6 @ 'keydown'
7 =>
8 param event
9 var keyName = event.key
10 if keyName === 'Control'
11 # do not alert when only Control key is pressed.
12 return
13 if event.ctrlKey && keyName === 'j'
14 set location.href= location.pathname + '?meta=json'
15 _ event.preventDefault
16 _ event.stopPropagation
17 if event.ctrlKey && keyName === 'h'
18 set location.href= location.pathname + '?meta=html'
19 _ event.preventDefault
20 _ event.stopPropagation
21 if event.ctrlKey && keyName === 'b'
22 var i = location.pathname.lastIndexOf('/')
23 set location.href= location.pathname.substr(0, i) + '?meta=html'
24 _ event.preventDefault
25 _ event.stopPropagation

primaryIttf.content:
{

	$
		var l_colors = "#B9D2DE;#919FA6;#3C7590;#D1E5EE;#D9E7EE;#C0C4E3;#9799AA;#3E4893;#D5D9F1;#DDDFF1;#BDE5CE;#95AC9F;#3D9563;#D2F2E0;#DBF2E5;#FFEAD2;#BFB4A6;#A67944;#FFF0DE;#FFF4E7".split(';')

	{ debug
		showPalette true

	{ theme
		fontAwesome true
		[ colors
			$foreach c in l_colors
				"${c}"
					
	{ html
		fontSize 14
	
	{ body
		backgroundColor "${l_colors[4]}"
		fontFamily 'roboto'
	
	{ navTop
		fixed true
		height 48
		backgroundColor "#fefefe"
		[ panels
			{
				kind "img-logo"
				src "/ittf/images/logo.svg.ittf"
				href '/ittf/html/index.html.ittf'
				height 36
				width 116
			{
				kind "flex"
				[ items
					{
						label "Home"
						href "#"
					{
						label "Concepts"
						href "#"
					{
						label "Docs"
						href "#"
					{
						label "Project"
						href "#"

	{ navSubTop
		fixed true
		height 116
		backgroundColor "${l_colors[15]}"
		[ items
			{
				label "Core"
				href "#"
			{
				label "Meta"
				href "#"
			{
				label "Js"
				href "#"
			{
				label "Web"
				href "#"

	{ navLeft
		$$ fixed true
		drawer true
		fullHeight true
		width 250
		drawerClosedWidth 50
		[ items
			{
				label "Home"
				icon "laptop"
				href "#"
			{
				label "Target technologies"
				icon "laptop"
				href "#"
			{
				label "Wizzi playground"
				icon "laptop"
				href "#"
			{
				label "Wizzi cheat sheets"
				icon "laptop"
				href "#"

	{ wrapMain
		fixed false
		padding 0

	{ contMain
		fixed false
		padding 2
		[ panels
			{
				kind "cards"
				[ cards
					{
						key "ittf"
						teaser "Start here"
						title "ittf & jsWizzi"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;ittf"
						subtitle "Familiarize with the indented tree text format and its script engine"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[0]}"
					{
						key "mtree"
						teaser "Powerful"
						title "mTree composition"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;mtree"
						subtitle "Building complex tree models composing ittf documents"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[1]}"
					{
						key "html"
						teaser "Intuitive"
						title "html schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;html"
						subtitle "Simple to start with"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[2]}"
					{
						key "css"
						teaser "Html companion"
						title "css schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;css"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[3]}"
					{
						key "scss"
						teaser "More than CSS"
						title "scss schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;scss"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[4]}"
					{
						key "js"
						teaser "Geecky"
						title "js schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;js"
						subtitle "Templating javascript modules"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[5]}"
					{
						key "svg"
						teaser "Funny"
						title "svg schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;svg"
						subtitle "Model driven 2D graphics"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[6]}"
					{
						key "md"
						teaser "Doc me"
						title "md (markdown) schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;md"
						subtitle "An html like markdown"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[7]}"
					{
						key "vtt"
						teaser "For video fans"
						title "vtt schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;vtt"
						subtitle "Simple video text formatter"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[8]}"
					{
						key "json"
						teaser "Easy"
						title "json (pseudo) schema"
						href "/ittf/docs/cheatsheets/wizzischema.html.ittf?_context=cs&_cs=cheatsheet;json"
						subtitle "The ubiquitous data model"
						backgroundColor "${l_colors[9]}"
